attributes.action: Take legal action aginst the radical Clerics and deport them.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a loyal British citizen, I have devoted 27 years of my life serving my country in HM Forces.I was utterly digusted to watch "Dispatches" on TV the other evening which depicted radical Muslim extremists preaching hate against the British way of life, which some of my friends and fellow servicemen have given their lives to defend. I want you to arrest,put on trial and then deport these anti British extremists. Legal action was taken against other extremist groups like the BNP. I say to you Prime Minister as the elected representative of the people you are charged with ensuring our ways of life and laws are upheld. It is not within your remit to have 'double standards' the loyalties of you and your cabinet are to the people who entrusted you with your office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
